To create a topic in oXygen, follow these steps:
Click the New icon ().
Navigate to Framework Templates/DITA/Topic, click the Topic entry, then click Create. oXygen creates a new topic with some placeholder content:

The topic ID is automatically created. You can change it if you want to, but remember that IDs need to be unique. In the Author view, you see this:It occurs to me what I really want is a video version of this.

You can now click inside the p (which is a placeholder for a

tag) and start typing in your content. To create a new paragraph, press Return twice. If you want to switch to another element, press Return once and choose from the drop-down menu that appears at your cursor location.
